secrets_store.main.page.title: Secrets Store
secrets_store.main.page.description: Encrypt and store sensitive information as secrets that are securely reusable across an account.
secrets_store.list.table.header.name: Name
secrets_store.list.table.empty.title: Securely use secrets across Cloudflare
secrets_store.list.table.empty.descripti: Secrets Store allows you store and manage secrets which can be used by resources across an account. Use role-based access control (RBAC) to authorize which users on this account can upload, edit, or remove secrets.
Create your first account-level secret by pressing the u2018Create secretu2019 button above.
